column4: I am trying to figure out what a good wireless router might be for my family to purchase, we use Dapper Drake, and I have looked around and it is very overwhelming I just don't know where to start
it shouldn't matter.  Routers speak standard protocols (well except draft-N, but that's a different matter).  It's your NICs you've gotta double check
how would I check my NIC if it is compatible?
google is usually the easiest.  Check for hardware compatability with linux and your card.  We have a hardware Compat list, I'm not sure it's up to date.
